title: FS-1887 N172 Old Judge HOF PSA 2 McCarthy

posts.post_title: FS-1887 N172 Old Judge HOF PSA 2 McCarthy
posts.post_content: SOLD1887 HOF Tommy McCarthy "Tagging Player on Ground" Phila. Old Judge graded Good by PSA. Fantastic centering and great image.  $325 shipped priority. Let me know if you have any questions or interest. I can email larger scans if interested. Thanks for looking! Dave
I'll Take it.  PM Sent also.
